title: About African Boxing Confederation (AFBC)
description: Welcome to the About page of the African Boxing Confederation (AFBC). Here, you'll find information about our organization's mission, vision, history, and more.
mission: Our Mission: To promote the sport of amateur boxing, develop young talent, and foster camaraderie and sportsmanship among athletes, coaches, and officials.
vision: Our Vision: To be recognized as a leading authority in amateur boxing, known for our commitment to excellence, integrity, and the well-being of our athletes.
history: History: The African Boxing Confederation (AFBC) was founded in [year] with the aim of providing a platform for amateur boxers to showcase their skills and compete at the highest level. Over the years, we have grown into a reputable organization with a strong presence in the boxing community.
